features: Material: High quality steel material, Max Load Capacity: 33lbs/15kg.
Compatible with: VESA 50X50mm(2"x2"), 75X75mm(3"x3"), 100X75mm(4"x3"), 100X100mm(4"x4"),Please check your blocked cable/input before buying or installing.
Slim profile mount holds the back of the TV just 0.5"/12mm away from the wall for a sleek tidy appearance.
Applicable Scene: Entertainment center, outdoor, kitchen, bathroom, coffee shop, KTV place, school, bus station, bedroom, living room, dining room, fireplace, camper, cruise ship,etc.
Package Included: 1 x Fixed Monitor Mount, 1 x Screws kit. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, our customer service team will reply to you within 24 hours.
body.description: Fixed Monitor Mount Features Fits 14"-24" LED, LCD Flat Curved Screen Monitor Fixed design, low profile of 0.5” from the wall Max Load Capacity: 33lbs Compatible VESA pattern (mounting holes): 50x50mm,75x75mm, 100x100mm Suitable For: Acer, HP, Sceptre, ASUS, LG, SAMSUNG, BenQ, Dell AOC, ViewSonic,etc. Installation Notes: Please install this Fixed Monitor Mount on concrete or brick wall.Package Includes: 1 x Fixed Monitor Mount 1 x Screws kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These work great for smaller tvs. Worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This worked very well
reviews.reviewText: One of those rare occasions when you get something that is worth more than you paid for it. The finish on this piece is very nice, it installs easily, and all hardware is included. Very pleased how it worked for a 20" flatscreen TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You are getting exactly what you are paying for
reviews.reviewText: This is a wall mount for under $10. It was the perfect fit for me, as I was trying to mount a 9" monitor and wanted something a bit more sturdy than velco command strips or a couple nails. It doesn't have any ergonomics or angles to adjust, it is literally just a plate that goes on the wall and your monitor/TV will sit completely flush against it. You won't have space to connect any cables out the back so be aware. Cheap, easy, quick solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap thin metal, not exactly as pictured
reviews.reviewText: I searched between a bunch of similar products in a similar price range and picked this one because it appeared, in the product photos at least, to be slightly better made. Unfortunately what I received looked identical to a couple other slightly cheaper priced items which had bad reviews due to the “sturdiness” of the metal… and with that said, was not exactly as the product photos pictured on this item.Regardless, it worked for its intended purpose of holding up a rather heavy 23” old Apple display monitor. It wobbles if you try to tilt the monitor side to side, for “sturdiness” testing, but it’s secure and I can’t imagine any situation where it will break or the monitor would fall off. I believe it was marketed towards use in RV’s.. and I probably wouldn’t advise of it being used for that purpose simply due to the amount it wobbles while holstered. If that doesn’t matter to you, then it shouldn’t be a big deal. What do you expect for around $10
